greeting: What can Roo do for you?
abourtMe: Thanks to the latest breakthroughs in agentic coding capabilities, I can handle complex software development tasks step-by-step. With tools that let me create & edit files, explore complex projects, use the browser, and execute terminal commands (after you grant permission), I can assist you in ways that go beyond code completion or tech support. I can even use MCP to create new tools and extend my own capabilities.
autoApproveDescription: Auto-approve allows Roo Code to perform actions without asking for permission. Only enable for actions you fully trust.
readFilesDescription: Allows access to read any file on your computer.
editFilesDescription: Allows modification of any files on your computer.
executeCommandsDescription: Allows execution of approved terminal commands. You can configure this in the settings panel.
useBrowserDescription: Allows ability to launch and interact with any website in a headless browser.
useMcpDescription: Allows use of configured MCP servers which may modify filesystem or interact with APIs.
switchModesDescription: Allows automatic switching between different modes without requiring approval.
subtasksDescription: Allow creation and completion of subtasks without requiring approval.
retryRequestsDescription: Automatically retry failed API requests when the provider returns an error response.
addContext: (@ to add context, / to switch modes
dragFiles: hold shift to drag in files
dragFilesImages: hold shift to drag in files/images
